Package com.ac.cst8319.lms.service

Class LibraryOperationsService

java.lang.Object
com.ac.cst8319.lms.service.LibraryOperationsService
public class LibraryOperationsService extends Object
Service for library operations (checkout, return, etc.).

    • checkoutBook

      public Checkout checkoutBook(long memberId, long bookCopyId, long librarianId)
      Checkout a book to a member.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member's user ID
      bookCopyId - the book copy ID
      librarianId - the librarian performing the checkout
      Returns:
      the created checkout record
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • returnBook

      public Checkout returnBook(long checkoutId, long librarianId)
      Return a book.
      Parameters:
      checkoutId - the checkout ID
      librarianId - the librarian processing the return
      Returns:
      the updated checkout record
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • getMemberOverdueCount

      Get the number of overdue items for a member.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member's user ID
      Returns:
      count of overdue checkouts

    • canCheckout

      public boolean canCheckout(long memberId)
      Check if a member can checkout books. Members cannot checkout if they are suspended or have overdue items.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member's user ID
      Returns:
      true if member can checkout, false otherwise
